snippet: Abigail Hansen, a senior at Minnetonka High School in Minnesota who wants to become a veterinarian, explains how her college decision was ultimately based on a "gut feeling."
abstract: Abigail Hansen, a senior at Minnetonka High School in Minnesota who wants to become a veterinarian, explains how her college decision was ultimately based on a "gut feeling."

headline.main: In the End, My Gut Decided Which College to Choose
